      Campus
      Stalker Reportedly Harassing Women After UCSB Lectures
      March 14, 2018 by Shomik Mukherjee

      Police are looking for a male UC Santa Barbara student who they say has stalked and harassed multiple women in the past week.

      The suspect has asked women for their phone numbers after classes, the UCSB Police Department (UCPD) announced in a university alert.

      “When the suspect feels ignored, he proceeds to harass the women, following them on social media, sending derogatory text and social media messages, and, in some cases, showing up at their residence,” the alert read.

      UCPD is investigating the crime. Anyone with information about this incident or a similar one can reach the department at (805) 893-3446.

      The story will be updated.
